revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Quests]][[Category:Player vs Monster]] [[File:Flag_cartography.gif|right]] __TOC__ ==Description== [[File:Map.gif]] Treasure Maps show the location of where a Treasure Chest is buried. The maps require [[Cartography]] skill to decode at which point it will no longer say it is tattered but will display the location of the buried treasure chest. They can be obtained from various creatures as listed below. A map may decoded by another person, but the person digging up the map must still have the minimum required [[Cartography]] skill for the level of treasure map. [[Mining|Mining skill]] helps but is not required. To dig for a map, left click on the map and then click "Dig for Treasure" - This will allow you to remain mounted and escape swiftly if the going gets tough! All treasure chests are trapped and [[Remove_Trap|Remove Trap skill]] will take care of it, but the skill is not required as many players simply cast [[Telekinesis]] on the chest to trigger the trap from a safe distance of five or more steps away. A high skill level in [[Lockpicking]] is useful as it vastly reduces the number of lockpick attempts required to open a chest. [[Mining|Mining skill]] is not required to dig up a treasure chest. However, the higher a character's [[Mining|Mining skill]], the further away from the exact spot they can be when attempting to dig up the chest. With no [[Mining|Mining skill]], the digger must be directly on the correct spot where the chest is buried. See [[Cartography]] In combination with a rune library of treasure map locations, this map http://www.uoforever.com/map.php will help you find the hidden treasures! [[File:Yd3eSQQ.png]] http://www.uoforever.com/map.php | Interactive map for Treasure Map Chests locations and numbers. ==Loot & Spawns== All monsters that spawn with the digging of the chest or spawn from looting items from within the chest are subject to becoming [[Paragons|Paragons]] which can significantly increase the difficulty of the treasure map. Keep these [[Paragons|Paragon]] chances in mind before attempting a map level based on the listed monsters below, but also keep in mind that [[Paragons|Paragons]] of the monsters can drop a [[Paragons#Paragon_Chests|Paragon Chest]] which has a guaranteed treasure map inside! In addition to to the listed gold, magic items, reagents and gems, treasure map chests also have a chance to contain: * [[Wands]] - a very high chance for [[Item_Identification#Item_Identification_Wand|Item Identification Wands]] * [[Random_Dungeon_Adventure#Fragments|RDA Fragments]] - The higher the map, the greater the chance. Note that these portal fragments share the same graphic ID as star sapphires but have a different Color Hue (1161). * [[Meta_Talismans#Relic_Qualities|Meta Talisman Crumbling Relics]] or [[Meta_Pets#Relic_Qualities|Meta Pet Crumbling Relics]] - Up to 20% drop chance at Level 7 * [[Antique_of_the_Artisan#Mythical_Crafting|Mythical Crafting Recipes]] - Level 7 Tmaps only but 100% chance to drop! * [[Dimensional_Archway##Dyeing_Archways|Dimensional Archway Dye deed]] - Level 7 Tmaps only {| cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" border="1" width="100%" ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Level ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Title ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Cartography Skill ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Lockpicking Skill ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Gold ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Magic Items ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Spawned Monsters |- align="center" |1 |Plainly |0 |52 |1000-1500 |6,

[[Antique_of_the_Artisan#Mythical_Crafting|Mythical Crafting Recipes]], Archway Dyes |Succubus, Revenant Lion, Werewolf, Balron, Ancient Shadow Wyrm |} ===Notes:=== * [[Meta_Talismans#Relic_Qualities|Crumbling Relics]] drop chance has been reduced as per patch notes March 5th , 2023: [https://www.uoforum.com/threads/8-7-4-0-notification-updates-minor-fixes-and-tons-of-extra-backend-logging.110178/ 8.7.4.0 - Notification updates, minor fixes, and tons of extra backend logging.] * Level 7 Treasure maps can only be obtained from [[Monster Contracts]] and [[Paragons|very high level paragon monsters (mainly bosses)]]. ==Gear== There are several items available to help regular treasure map hunters collect and sort through their map collection. ===TMap Book=== A blessed book that holds up to 32 treasure maps, deciphered or not. If they are deciphered, a view option will appear for the map. You will have to remove the map from the book to dig up the treasure. Being blessed, this is a convenient item for anyone to have to safely store the treasure maps you collect while killing monster. The book is available for 100,000 gold pieces from the Sascha the Unique Wares Vendor just west of West Britain Bank File:TmapbookView.png|TMap Book Interface File:TmapbookVendor.png|TMap Book Vendor ===Map Storage Cabinet=== Stores undecoded treasure maps and keeps track of completed ones as well. 125 of each map level can be stored. The cabinet can be purchased for 300,000 gold pieces from Sascha the Unique Wares Vendor. File:TmapcabinetInterface.png|Map Storage Cabinet Interface File:MapstoragecabinetVendor.png|Map Storage Cabinet Vendor ===Davies' Locker=== This giant locker can hold up to 500 treasure maps and [[Message in a Bottle|MIB's]]. They are all mapped out in a decorative table that can be placed in your house. A real time saver for organization of big collections of MIBs and maps! The locker can be bought for 10,000 [[Donation Coin|Donation Coins]] from Nadine the Exotic Item Donation Vendor just in front of West Britain Bank. File:Davieslockerinterface.png|Davies' Locker Interface File:DavieslockerVendor.png|Davies' Locker Vendor File:Davieslockerorientation.png|Davies' Locker Placement ===Upgraded Davies' Locker=== As of August of 2019 there is now an upgrade available for the Davies' Locker. This upgrade can be purchased for 500,000 gold from the gold sink vendor Sasha. This now allows items inside of the locker to be sorted by either map level or map location. Once you have purchased the deed you would bring it to the locker you wish to upgrade, double click the deed and then target the locker to upgrade. This then will allow you to access the sort options for the Locker. File:DaviesLockerUpgrade.PNG|Vendor with Davies' Upgrade File:UpgradedDavies2.PNG|Upgraded Sorted Menu
